documents.document: @MrJames_D @JamTarts I'm leaving for Inverness soon so it's going to be hard on my mobile battery 😑

@rickkinley @iandicko73 I have been Richard and I'm retiring to a lovely wee village 20 miles from Malaga 👍👍
@iandicko73 I just try and get on with folk, from anywhere in the world, granted some are total arseholes..
@iandicko73 Maybe your right, but we all share a small planet and we should try to get on..
@iandicko73 I like to think when I'm lying on the beach on the Costa del sol every summer that we are culturally reasonably close..😊
@iandicko73 Because Ian our great county is part of the continent of Europe...
